body: Also I need a closure on this doujin that last few pages gave me such unsettling vibe. Surely the artist will let the main character live right ?

OK to sum up the girl is probably a monster that eats people but she only targets the bad ones (the boy told her the reason he's running is to fight bad guys, and she said he's on his side. Don't know if it's a lie, but it's there) and she runs a bar that serves human blood or meat for other monsters (the guy that came in is hella sus, given his eyes).

@tobajas Well rather nice analysis, but there is a chance she is a vampire instead or vampire like creature. The shota meats her at the night, she is open at night, she is had some kind of shop, also lot of wine in the shop which to me heavily imply it's meant to be a vampire. In the fridge it doesn't necessarily has to be meat, it could contain blood as well. Also her eye color is red as well, which gives her a very demon or nonhuman creature like vibe and also could imply she is a vampire. So to me the imagery is play more into the vampire theory.
coloring is great
https://www.loveharem.it/

Yeah I had another look at this and well my thoughts are pretty much the same, girl shows up, teacher warns everyone to be careful at night cause people have been going missing. Then lots of sex, kid tells her about being bullied and then seemingly a short while after all the bullies seems to have dissapeared and no one seems to care. Then he opens her fridge to make some food for them and it is seemingly filled with nothing but meat. Then she say's rather then that she'd like to eat him, in a sexual way. So while not outright said it feels like yeah she's a cannibal but she only eats certain kind of ppl. Somehow it made me think of a mix of dexter and american psycho. Dexter having a code of only killing "bad ppl" though it flucuates at how "bad" they have to be depending on how long ago it was he killed someone. While American psycho just kill ppl and store their corpses in his fridge...
I think she is a vampire...
Honestly can't tell if the chick is actually trying to eat him or if that's just dirty talk. I'm just gonna act like she only murders and eats bad guys
Well in page 48 he mentioned some bullies and she says "lm in your side" maybe those are the corpses from the fridge"
Pretty dark. He is definitely dead.

So I guess she's a cannibal but apparently she eats bad people, and maybe that guy is involved too.
Also when the kid said he wanted to be stronger cause there were some bad people around, she said ''I'm on your side". 
Maybe she was just being supportive, or maybe that was more foreshadow.
Yup, pg. 10 was the moment I checked the comments. Thanks for the save fellas.
